name: Trojer Anna
description:
Sunny, quiet position in Laimach. Restaurants and groceries are only few minutes away also ski-bus-stop to the skiareas "Horberg" and "Zillertal Arena" . The appartment is situated on the first floor and is suited for 7 to 9 people. Equipped with a big living-citchen, e-stove, oven, coffee-machine, mixer, toaster, micro, freezer, and a well sorted glass equippment. There are 3 douberooms and one three-bed-room with couch. All rooms are with shower, WC, toilett artikels, hair dryer, bed linen and shovels. Colour Sat-TV, radio, CD-player and balcony. free WIFI

Phone from 18.00 clock.

Children untill 5 years are free.
Free entrance in Hippach adventure outdoor swimming pool and payless using of tennis courts!
Cleaning: â‚¬ 30,00 (one times a week)
